history.proof: intros. intros y Hy. qsimpl use: filter_mono. qsimpl use: filter_mono. qsimpl use: rem_incl,filter_mono. qsimpl use: rem_incl,filter_mono. hauto use: rem_not_in, in_rem_iff unfold: incl.

exceptions.tactic: intros X B A x H.
intros X' B A x H.
intros X' B' A x H.
intros X' B' A' x H.
intros X' B' A' x' H.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : eqType A, B : list X x : X H : A <<= B y : X Hy : y el rem A x Unable to unify "forall a : ?M1559, a el filter ?M1560 ?M1561 -> a el filter ?M1560 ?M1562" with "(fix In (a : X) (l : list X) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) y (rem B x)".

In environment H0 : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> bool) (A B : list X), A <<= B -> filter p A <<= filter p B X : eqType A, B : list X x : X H : A <<= B y : X Hy : y el rem A x Unable to unify "A <<= B" with "y el rem B x".

In environment H1 : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> bool) (A B : list X), A <<= B -> filter p A <<= filter p B X : eqType A, B : list X x : X H : A <<= B y : X Hy : y el rem A x Unable to unify "forall a : X, a el rem ?M1887 ?M1888 -> a el ?M1887" with "(fix In (a : X) (l : list X) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) y (rem B x)".

In environment H2 : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> bool) (A B : list X), A <<= B -> filter p A <<= filter p B X : eqType H0 : forall A x, rem A x <<= A A, B : list X x : X H : A <<= B y : X Hy : y el rem A x Unable to unify "y el rem A x" with "y el rem B x".

original: intros X B A x H. intros y Hy. apply filter_mono. apply H. apply rem_incl. apply Hy.
